domain.title:
Antitrust/
Competition
domain.text:
We advise our clients in the matters of competition pertaining to mergers, acquisitions and joint ventures and assist them in preparation and filing of documents required for the merger clearance before the Serbian authorities, in charge for the protection of competition.
    Our attorneys guide and counsel clients in all aspects of rules and regulations concerning antitrust and competition issues, during negotiations, in entering into cooperation agreements and other commercial contracts.
    Our associates are experienced in representing and defending clients in proceedings related to the abuse of dominant position on the market and antitrust procedures, and providing legal support including the development of defense strategies and claims for damages.
